# beget_configurations (Data Source)

List available VPS configurations, optionally filtered by region, CPU group, or availability flag.

## Filters
- `region`: limit configurations to a specific location (e.g., `ru1`)
- `group`: CPU family, such as `high_cpu`
- `only_available`: keep only configurations that can be provisioned now

## Fields
Each map entry exposes `id`, `name`, `cpu`, `ram_mb`, `disk_mb`,
`bandwidth_public`, price attributes, and availability flags.

## Example Usage
```terraform
# Fetch all available configurations
data "beget_configurations" "all" {}

output "configuration_ids" {
  value = keys(data.beget_configurations.all.configurations)
}
```
```terraform
# Filter configurations by region and CPU family
data "beget_configurations" "ru1_high" {
  region         = "ru1"
  group          = "high_cpu"
  only_available = true
}

locals {
  ru1_high = data.beget_configurations.ru1_high.configurations
}

output "ru1_high_summary" {
  value = {
    count  = length(local.ru1_high)
    sample = local.ru1_high[one(keys(local.ru1_high))]
  }
}
```

- `group` (String)
- `only_available` (Boolean)
- `region` (String)

- `bandwidth_public` (Number)
- `configurable` (Boolean)

- `custom` (Boolean)
- `disk_mb` (Number)
- `group` (String)
- `id` (String)
- `name` (String)
- `price_day` (Number)
- `price_month` (Number)
- `ram_mb` (Number)
- `region` (String)
